title: New champion capsules
body:
Ok 1st i just want to see this update is cool and what not but so far I've opened up to champion capsules and both times getting a champion i already owned... I am level 30 but still have about 40 to 50 champs left I think? but these 2 capsules I've opened gave me champs i own one of them being Ziggs. 

Riot please tell me if this is intentional or not.

replies.body: The capsules and chests are random as always, but that should alright since you're able to disenchant them for essence which you can then use to purchase something specific.
ok thanks! just wanted to clarify.
